Title: Harpy Culling
Description:
The harpies seem to be in league with the ogres. Many of them are gathering to attack our camp.

We must thin their numbers and thwart their attempts to eliminate us.

Perhaps they will learn it is best to leave the Horde be.
RewardText: The harpies seem to be retreating to their roost. That should give us time to stop the ogres.
